data.title: Lewes to Newhaven Harbour Trains from £3.50*
data.meta_description: Travel from Lewes to Newhaven Harbour by train for as little as £3.50*. The average travel time is 11m, covering approximately 9 miles .
data.text:
Arriving in Newhaven Harbour

Trains running from Lewes to Newhaven Harbour will typically take around at least 11m and there are approximately 32 trains running everyday.

Book the cheap train tickets from Lewes to Newhaven Harbour

Let's save unnecessary costs when travelling from Lewes to Newhaven Harbour by taking trains. The best way to find cheap train tickets is through Trip.com. We offer various discounted tips that can guide you towards a more affordable journey, such as using Railcards, Season Tickets, or Split Tickets. Explore the options below for more choices.

Using the Railcard for 1/3 off

With a Railcard, you can save up to 1/3 on most rail fares. There are different types of Railcards available, such as the 16-25 Railcard, the Family & Friends Railcard, and the Senior Railcard, each designed to cater to specific groups of travellers. You can discover more about Railcards here.

Group travels to save 1/3

If you are travelling in a group of three to nine people, you can take advantage of group travel discounts. Many train companies offer group save options that provide a discount of up to 1/3 on standard fares. This can make travelling from Lewes to Newhaven Harbour more affordable for families, friends, or colleagues planning a trip together.

Book in advance to save an average of 61%
